foreman.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a worker who is in charge of a group of other workers, for example in a factory
foreman.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the leader of a jury, who announces their decision in court
foreman.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a man who is in charge of a group of workers, for example in a factory
foreman.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the foreman of a building site
foreman.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a person who is the leader of a JURY (=the group of ordinary people who decide whether someone is guilty in some courts of law)
foreman.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The foreman of the jury read out the verdict to the packed courtroom.
